arts.ttl: Three Barcelona prodigies train with the first-team ahead of Girona clash
arts.sum: With the international break coming to an end, Barcelona are set to resume their campaign this weekend as they take on Girona. However, coach Hansi Flick is dealing with an apparent injury crisis heading into this game, with the likes of Dani Olmo, Robert Lewandowski, and Ferran Torres joining the list of absentees during the […] The post Three Barcelona prodigies train with the first-team ahead of Girona clash appeared first on Barca Universal.
